Fault  T oler ant  If  any  partition  of  an  R DD  is  lost ,  it  will  automatically  be  rec om puted  using  the  transformations  that  originally  created  it . 
 
 The  operations  on  R DD s  take  user - defined  functions ,  which  are  closures  in  functional  programming  as  Spark  is  implemented  in  Scala .  A  closure  can  refer  to  variables  in  the  scope  when  created ,  which  will  be  copied  to  the  workers  when  Spark  runs  a  closure .
